education.description: Masters in Physics with a minor in Computer Science.

Deep Learning Specialization: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyper-parameter tuning

projects.title: State level covid cases forecasting (ML course Project)
projects.institution: National Institute of Science Education and Research
descriptions: Implemented VARMAX for multivariate forecasting and a random forest model to find the correlation to another state from a heavily infected (hotspot) state.
Proposed an idea of devising a model integrating COVID-19 compartmental models and Deep Learning models.

projects.title: Emergence of local irreversibility in complex interacting systems (Term paper)
projects.institution: National Institute of Science Education and Research
descriptions: Gave an intuitive analysis of the framework devised by (Lynn et al., 2022) and their illustrations to see how "interaction" between systems contributes to the arrow of time.

projects.title: Boosting nonlinear optics with Near-zero refractive index materials (Brief literature survey)
projects.institution: National Institute of Science Education and Research
descriptions: Gave a brief survey on near-zero refractive index materials, which can be used to interrogate the fundamental principles of quantum mechanics.

projects.title: Non-linear dynamic models for ideological conflicts (Term paper)
projects.institution: National Institute of Science Education and Research
descriptions: Reviewed the models constructed in (10.1103/PhysRevLett.109.118702) for ideological conflict and revolution in a population and replenished their results.

projects.title: Earth Field NMR and MRI (Open-ended Lab)
projects.institution: National Institute of Science Education and Research

projects.title: Antenna Design for detecting Decametric Jovian Radio-Emission from Jupiter: Using FEKO (Open-ended Lab)
projects.institution: National Institute of Science Education and Research
descriptions: Team: Fida, Varun, Sreerag, Niveditha, Jabir.
